channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Toughest Places To Play In North America: Where Do Arrowhead, Michigan Stadium Rank?
item.description: Here are the toughest places to play in sports across North America.

item.title: No. 19 Kansas Finishes on 27-7 Run To Beat Kansas State, 86-62
item.description: Kansas overcame the absence of standout guard Darryn Peterson with a big finishing kick for an 86-62 win over Kansas State.

item.title: Messi, Inter Miami Start Preseason With A Loss to Alianza Lima In Peru
item.description: nter Miami endured a rough start to 2026, falling 3-0 in their preseason opener to Alianza Lima in Peru.

item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Steelers OC Arthur Smith Leaving for Ohio State
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: Liverpool's inconsistencies have never been made more apparent
item.description: Liverpool's last-minute loss to Bournemouth has further strengthened the faults that the team has encountered all season long.

item.title: Steelers to hire Mike McCarthy: Six questions on the new coach, plus a grade

item.title: Women's Bracketology: Chavez, OT win boost Sooners' hopes of hosting
item.description: Three straight losses sent the Sooners tumbling out of the top 16. They return after beating South Carolina.
